relics.name: Brass Goblet
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 thevacant:Void.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact with dark power.

relics.name: Locket Piece
relics.description: thevacant:Ricochet the first 2 cards you thevacant:Mill each combat.
relics.flavorText: A reminder of a life lost. Or at least, a piece of one.

relics.name: Silk Touch
relics.description: The first time you thevacant:Mine a thevacant:Gem each turn, trigger its effect without reducing its size.
relics.flavorText: Swinging from side to side, side-side to side.

relics.name: Deathbell
relics.description: At the end of your first turn, if you are thevacant:Hollow, gain 10 Temporary_HP.
relics.flavorText: This flower is said to ward off ill times and death.

relics.name: Holly
relics.description: Whenever you gain a debuff, reduce its amount by 1 to a minimum of 1.

relics.name: Polishing Rag
relics.description: At the end of your turn, increase the size of your 3 rightmost thevacant:Gems.
relics.flavorText: Shiny gems are more powerful, everyone knows this.

relics.name: Enshrouded Goblet
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 thevacant:Void and 2 thevacant:Shroud.

relics.name: Shroud Fragment
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 3 thevacant:Shroud.

relics.name: Overflowing Goblet
relics.description: Replaces Brass Goblet. At the start of combat, draw 2 cards and gain 2 Artifact.
relics.flavorText: An ancient artifact, now overflowing with dark power.

relics.name: Overshrouded Goblet
relics.description: Replaces Enshrouded Goblet. At the start of combat, gain 2 thevacant:Void, Artifact, and thevacant:Shroud, and draw 2 cards.

relics.name: Tombstone
relics.description: At the start of combat, after you draw, thevacant:Mill your draw pile. Upon pickup, increase the power of your Goblet by 2.
relics.flavorText: Just as we all go to the grave eventually, all cards go to the discard pile eventually.

relics.name: Unbound Soul
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn if you are thevacant:Hollow.
relics.flavorText: As death closes in, the Goblet's hold on you weakens, and you feel your power grow.

relics.name: Cracked Crystal Ball
relics.description: The first time you play a card each turn, add a copy to your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.
relics.flavorText: Sometimes magic leaking into the world is more powerful than when it is contained.

potions.name: Scramble Potion
potions.description: Draw until your hand is full. Each card drawn has a 1 in 2 chance to be drawn face down.

potions.name: Flask of Invisibility
potions.description: Gain 6 Shroud. Block is not removed at the start of your next 2 turns.

keywords.name: Amethyst
keywords.description: Gem: Mill 3.

keywords.name: Antifact
keywords.description: Negates the next buff.

keywords.name: Breakdown
keywords.description: Prevents the next time you would lose HP this turn.

keywords.name: Chip
keywords.description: Trigger the effect and reduce the size of a Gem.

keywords.name: Darkness
keywords.description: Whenever a debuff is applied to this target, increase its amount.

keywords.name: Diamond
keywords.description: Gem: Gain 1 Breakdown, which prevents the next time you would lose HP this turn.

keywords.name: Dizzy
keywords.description: Next turn, draw an extra card, but the first 3 cards you draw are face down.

keywords.name: Doom
keywords.description: Creatures take more damage for each Doom they have.

keywords.name: Emerald
keywords.description: Gem: Draw 1 card.

keywords.name: Everyone
keywords.description: ALL enemies and you.

keywords.name: Exhume
keywords.description: Put a card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.

keywords.name: Gem
keywords.description: Gems are Orbs that reduce in size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Heavy
keywords.description: When your deck is reshuffled, move to the bottom of the draw pile.

keywords.name: Hollow
keywords.description: Hollow effects trigger if you are at or below 50% of your max health, OR if you are debuffed.

keywords.name: [#C687EE]Materialize[]
keywords.description: If this card is Exhausted, it loses 1 Materialize at the end of your turn. Once all Materialize is lost, this card is moved to the top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Mill
keywords.description: Move an amount of cards from the top of your draw pile to your discard pile.

keywords.name: Mine
keywords.description: Create an orb slot and fill it with a Gem, which loses size at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Onyx
keywords.description: Gem: Apply 1 Doom to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Opal
keywords.description: Gem: Gain [E]

keywords.name: Polish
keywords.description: Increase the size of a Gem.

keywords.name: Reap
keywords.description: Heal this much HP when you attack this target. Removed at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Return
keywords.description: Move the top playable card from your discard pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Ricochet
keywords.description: If this card would be Milled, add it to your hand instead of the discard pile.

keywords.name: Rift
keywords.description: Temporarily removes your debuffs for a number of turns. They still count towards your number of debuffs.

keywords.name: Ruby
keywords.description: Gem: Gain 3 Vigor.

keywords.name: Sapphire
keywords.description: Gem: Gain 3 Temperance.

keywords.name: Shard
keywords.description: Void affects ALL cards, regardless of if your draw pile is empty, for a number of turns. If you end your turn with an empty draw pile, Shard doesn't count down.

keywords.name: Shroud
keywords.description: Halve incoming attack damage. Reduced by 1 at the start of your turn, and whenever you play an Attack.

keywords.name: Syphon
keywords.description: Remove this power from the target and gain it yourself. If they do not have enough, they gain negative amounts.

keywords.name: Temperance
keywords.description: The next time you Block, gain additional Block.

keywords.name: Topaz
keywords.description: Gem: Gain 1 Artifact.

keywords.name: Unnate
keywords.description: Starts each combat at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: [#ee82ee]Void[]
keywords.description: When your draw pile is empty, deal more damage and gain more Block.

keywords.name: [#ee82ee]Voidbound[]
keywords.description: Void affects this card regardless of if your draw pile is empty.

mods.name: The Vacant
mods.description: A lost soul, bound to an artifact, is doomed to climb the Spire.
